architectural_notes: Theme defaults should match Version 11 (avoid forcing dark/extra-dim mode on startup).

existing_features.title: Promote the currently reviewed draft build to the live/production deployment so end users load this version by default (i.e., the live canister assets and backend match the current draft).
As part of go-live, ensure the deployed UI theme defaults are not in an unintended extra-dim/dark state compared to the version the user just approved.

projectName: Promote current draft build to live production deployment
